title: The Ritz-Carlton Set To Debut In Mexico City In 2019 (The Ritz-Carlton Hotel Company LLC) ...
text: ( Source : The Ritz-Carlton Hotel Company LLC ) Legendary luxury hotel brand to introduce stunning new hotel on Avenida Reforma MEXICO CITY , D.F. - ( Oct. 14 , 2015 ) - The Ritz-Carlton Hotel Company, L.L.C . today announced plans to open its
